name: Prim d'avust
description:
PRIM D'AVUST

Was created for the LOWREZJAM 18 event. 
"The goal of the jam is to create a game with a resolution of 64x64 pixels."

The basic theme is the Swiss National Day. 

Prim d'avust means in Rumantsch August 1. 

Rumantsch is one of our 4 national languages.

GAMEPLAY

The game is based on the 15 puzzle principle. It has 4 different puzzles to solve.

The special thing about this version is that at the beginning you don't have a hint how the final picture looks like. 

When the tile is moved to the right place an acoustic and visual help is given.

TECHNICAL

Made with Godot Engine 2 and Pyxel Edit 0.45

CREDITS

https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov for the background music

Have fun solving the sliding puzzle.
